card.name: Aaron's Reproach
card.text: Target artifact becomes a 4/4 Snake creature with deathtouch until end of turn. It's still an artifact.

card.name: Elisha's Justice
card.text: Destroy all creatures with power 2 or less and all tokens. Create a 3/3 Green Bear Token with Trample.

card.name: Centurion
card.text: If Jesus is on the battlefield, prevent all damage to 1/1 creatures you control.

card.name: Judas
card.text: {T}, When this creature enters, create a treasure token. {T}: Put a finality counter on target legendary creature or Planeswalker. Create two Treasure Tokens. When this creature dies, send it to Hell.

card.name: Sodom
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add a Salt counter to this land. {T}, {4}: Remove 4 Salt counters from this land. Sacrifice it. Destroy all creatures.

card.name: Walk on Water
Adam's Rib
card.text: {T}: Add {CC}. Sacrifice this artifact: Create a 2/2 Green and White Human Token named Eve.

card.name: Judas' Kiss
card.text: Put a Finality counter on target creature. If that creature is Legendary, create two treasure tokens.

card.name: Smite the Fig Tree
card.text: Destroy target Forest, Artifact, or creature with flying.

card.name: Peaceful Finality
card.text: Exile all creatures from target player's graveyard. Draw a card and lose one life.

card.name: Pontius Pilate
card.text: When this creature enters, put a finality counter on target creature an opponent controls. If that creature is legendary, add RRR. When this creature dies, send it to Limbo.

card.name: Dorcas
card.text: When this creature enters, gain two life. {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less gains indestructible until end of turn

card.name: Lazarus
card.text: When a Legendary creature or Plansewalker enters, return this creature from your graveyard to the battlefiled tapped

card.name: Sermon on the Mount
card.text: When this card enters, create a Food token, a Clue token, and a Treasure token. Proliforate and populate. Creatures you control have Inspire.

card.name: Mary, Mother of Christ
card.text: When this creature enters, create a 1/1 Blue Legendary infant token named Jesus with Indestructible. This creature cannot attack. When this creature dies, send it to Heaven.

card.name: The Cock Crows
card.text: Chose one: Create 3 1/1 Red Rooster tokens with haste. Create a Treasure Token and lose 3 life. Send a creature to Hell.

card.name: Jesus' Sandals
Reverse Animate
card.text: Send two target creatures from a graveyard into Heaven, Hell or Limbo. Chose a destination for each.

card.name: Douse the Lintels
card.text: As an additional cost to play this card, pay 1 life or sacrifice a creature. Vanishing 3. You have Protection from Curses. You gain 2 life each turn. Creatures you control have Hexproof.

card.name: The Wolf and the Lamb
card.text: Target Creature you control and target Creature an Opponent controls each gain indestructible until end of turn. If you can't target an opponent's creature, gain a life.

card.name: The True Cross
card.text: {T}: Add {2}. You lose 2 life.

card.name: Resolve Fate
card.text: Send Target Creature to Heaven or Hell.

card.name: Diluted River
card.text: This land enters tapped with a stun counter. Create a treasure token. {T}: Add U or B.

card.name: Renewing Pasture
card.text: This land enters tapped with a stun counter. Create a treasure token. {T}: Add W or G.

card.name: City of Chaff
card.text: This land enters tapped with a stun counter. Create a treasure token when it enters. {T}: Add W or R.

card.name: Contemplative Islet
card.text: This land enters tapped with a stun counter. Create a treasure token when it enters. {T}: Add W or U.

card.name: Revered Tomb
card.text: This land enters tapped with a stun counter. Create a treasure token when it enters. {T}: Add B or G.

card.name: Life's Cradle
card.text: This land enters tapped with a stun counter. Create a treasure token when it enters. {T}: Add U or G.

card.name: Gnashing Firefield
card.text: This land enters tapped with a stun counter. Create a treasure token when it enters. {T}: Add B or R.

card.name: Ascetics' Refuge
card.text: This land enters tapped with a stun counter. Create a treasure token when it enters. {T}: Add W or B.

card.name: Moss Junction
card.text: This land enters tapped with a stun counter. Create a treasure token when it enters. {T}: Add R or G.

card.name: Forget the LORD
card.text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Each player gets 1 poison counter.

card.name: Goliath
card.text: When this creature enters, it deals 1 damage to each non-giant creature. Trample, haste. If damage is dealt to this creature by a creature with power 1 or less, destroy it and send it to Limbo.

card.name: Enter Nephilim
card.text: Create 2 3/3 green Giant token creatures with trample.

card.name: The Afterlife
card.text: Creatures you control have Inspire. Whenever a food enters or when you sacrifice one, create a 4/4 white Angel token with vigilance and flying.

card.name: Honeycomb
card.text: Target player gains 3 life. Draw a card.

card.name: Hem of the Savior
card.text: Gain 3 life. Create a blood token.

card.name: Crown of Thorns
card.text: Equip 1 Equipped creature has -1/-1 When a creature is equipped with this artifact, draw a card.

card.name: Shofar
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this artifact, sacrifice a creature. If that creature was a Donkey, create a blood counter. {T}, {W}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. {R}: Target creature gains +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Assumption
card.text: Target creature goes to Heaven. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Noah's Blessing
card.text: Creatures that share a creature type gain indestructible until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on each targeted creature.

card.name: Absalom, Absalom!
card.text: If an opponent has committed a crime this turn, this creature enters with a +2/+2 counter on it.

card.name: Boils
card.text: Vanishing 3 Enchant target player. That player’s creatures get a -1/-1 counter each turn.

card.name: David's Mighty Men
card.text: I: Create 3 1/1 Human Soldier Tokens. II: Choose one: Create a 3/2 Avatar Token named Ishbaal; Create a 1/4 Human Token named Eleazer, or Create a 2/2 Human Druid named Shammah. III: Creatures you control gain Indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Bathsheba
card.text: When this creature enters, Goad one creature for each opponent. Deathtouch.

card.name: Limbo
card.text: T: add C If Jesus is on the battlefield or in Limbo, this land taps for one mana of any mana.

card.name: Herod the Great
card.text: Trample 1, RR: Destroy all creatures with power 2 or less. When you activate this ability, surviving creatures your opponents control have hexproof until this creature leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Acolyte
card.text: At the beginning of your combat step, create a 1/1 red devil creature tapped and attacking. It deals 1 damage to any target when it enters. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of your next end step.

card.name: Frogs
card.text: Vanishing 4 Enchant target player. When this enchantment enters and on enchanted player's draw step, they create a 1/1 green frog token with deathtouch. On enchanted player's end step, they lose a life for each frog they control. When this enchantment leaves the battlefield, destroy all frogs.

card.name: Hail
card.text: Vanishing 2 When this enchantment enters and on the beginning of enchanted player's draw step, choose one: • Deal 2 damage to any target • Return target creature to its owner's hand

card.name: Jesus
card.text: +1: You gain 2 life. -2: Return target creature from your graveyard to the battlefield. -8: All creatures go to Heaven.

card.name: Satan
card.text: +1: Deal two damage to any target. -2: Send a creature to Hell. -7: You get an emblem with “whenever a creature dies, each opponent loses 2 life.”

cards.name: Satan
cards.text: On the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1.
